layout.name: limit
layout.title: Current Limit
layout.tooltip:
How many tiles it should extend.
1 tile is 32 pixels A.K.A. a normal sized block.

layout.name: angle
layout.title: Water Current Angle
layout.tooltip:
The angle of the water current.
0 - up
90 - right
180 - down
270 - left

layout.name: width
layout.title: Water Current Width
layout.tooltip:
The width of the water current, in pixels.
Default to 32.

layout.name: createBubbles
layout.title: Create Bubbles
layout.tooltip: Should it create bubbles? A user suggested this so I added it I suppose.

layout.name: xMomentum
layout.title: Use Momentum For Horizontal Movement
layout.tooltip:
If true, the water current will use momentum instead of simply pushing the player horizontally.
This has the effect of the player being thrown out of the water current.
Also, if the power is under 1, the player will not be moved. I didn't code this, it's simply SMBX being SMBX.
This also somehow breaks if the player runs????? I have no idea but it happens

layout.name: bubbleSpeed
layout.title: Bubble Speed
layout.tooltip:
If this is different than 0, it uses this as the speed of the bubbles instead of the power.
Intended to be used alongside the option above if you want the current to be momentum-based but it can also be used without it.
